    • Uses of Projectile in Pickups

      Methods in Pickups that return types with arguments of type Projectile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> Weapon.fire(int xLoc, int yLoc, double angle) 
      java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> Shotgun.fire(int xLoc, int yLoc, double angle)
      "Fires" projectile after a cooldown of 1 second by adding projectile into ArrayList
      java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> Rifle.fire(int xLoc, int yLoc, double angle)
      "Fires" projectile after a cooldown of 0.2 seconds by adding projectile into ArrayList
      java.util.ArrayList<Projectile> Pistol.fire(int xLoc, int yLoc, double angle)
      "Fires" projectile after a cooldown of 0.5 seconds by adding projectile into ArrayList
